 DragonFLy::
Dragonfly dogged  and looked to Hotrod
"Then Autobot"replied the Predacon"I challenge you... I challenge you a fight to death... Do you accept it?"
  RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote: ::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod again avoided the 25 shots, with ease. 
"At least I do more then stand around and shoot. And I'm not a Maximal,
I'm an Autobot!"
He lunges at Dragonfly, attmpting to spear his opponent.
